entry.title: Vol.58 The Things You Don't Know About Emi Fukahori and MAME
entry.summary: In 2018, at the World Brewers Cup stage in Brazil, a cute lady with pigtails brought huge surprises to specialty coffee professionals. She boldly used Laurina (a low-caffeine coffee) from Daterra farm in Brazil, which none of the competitors had ever used on the stage. Pairing it with a brand-new brewing vessel - the Gina, she presented a perfect performance and took the crown back home. Since then, her name has been memorized by the world. She is Emi Fukahori, a girl from Japan, who spent her best time in Zurich, Switzerland for over a decade. Unlike the traditional Japanese girl, Emi had strong self-awareness when she was young. She is outgoing, brave, and open-minded, while also having a strong curiosity about the world. Coming from a tourism background, she stumbled into specialty coff‚Ä¶
